action-gitaccess: access the content of this wiki with Git
right-gitaccess: Access the content of this wiki with Git
gitaccess-desc: Git Access allows access to a MediaWiki wiki via Git.
gitaccess-specialpagehome-info: You may access the content of this wiki via Git like this:
gitaccess-specialpagehome-readonly: Note: You may not push content to this wiki right now, as it is in read-only mode.
gitaccess-error-dumbhttpaccess: Error: It appears that you are attempting to access this repository without a smart HTTPS protocol-enabled Git client. This extension does not support the "dumb" HTTP protocol.
gitaccess-error-invalidrepo: Error: This repository does not exist. See [[Special:GitAccess]]
gitaccess-error-reservedchangetag: This tag name is reserved for commit tracking by the GitAccess extension and may not be used as a regular tag.
